Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Statuette
Description: Statuette of a seated figure, the left leg folded under him and the right one bent sideways. In order to hold the position, the left arm rests on the ground, hand and fingers opened. The right arm is folded over the belly and the right hand is clenching a bird. The collar and the folds of the tunic are depicted with incisions in the stone. The back of the object is flat.
